recipesJson.name: let them eat CAKE
recipesJson.author: MotherPunker
recipesJson.description:
It took me a long time to get a good cake that I could taste ALL parts of. WF really has the be all of cakes. 
LA cake batter is just such an amazing flavour. Way better than FW cake batter dip IMO. 
Ice cream, meringue and frosting make up the frosting and back up the moistness of the cake. 

The cookie is in there as a back note to take the mix from a cake flavoured custard to an actually BAKED cake. 

Sprinkles and powdered sugar give us our sprinkles and sugar linger. 

I like to load this with super sweet but sweeten to your liking. 



If you mix it, please review it. Itâ€™s just good etiquette. :)
